verses.verse: שׁוֹטְט֞וּ <WH7751> Run ye to and fro בְּחוּצ֣וֹת <WH2351> through the streets יְרוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem וּרְאוּ־ <WH7200> and see נָ֤א <WH4994> now וּדְעוּ֙ <WH3045> now and know וּבַקְשׁ֣וּ <WH1245> and seek בִרְחוֹבוֹתֶ֔יהָ <WH7339> in the broad places אִם־ <WH518> If תִּמְצְא֣וּ <WH4672> thereof if ye can find אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> a man אִם־ <WH518> If יֵ֛שׁ <WH3426> if there be עֹשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> [any] that executeth מִשְׁפָּ֖ט <WH4941> judgment מְבַקֵּ֣שׁ <WH1245> that seeketh אֱמוּנָ֑ה <WH530> the truth וְאֶסְלַ֖ח <WH5545> and I will pardon לָֽהּ׃

וְאִ֥ם <WH518> and although חַי־ <WH2416> liveth יְהֹוָ֖ה <WH3068> The LORD יֹאמֵ֑רוּ <WH559> And though they say לָכֵ֥ן <WH3651> after that לַשֶּׁ֖קֶר <WH8267> falsely יִשָּׁבֵֽעוּ׃ <WH7650> surely they swear

יְהֹוָ֗ה <WH3068> O LORD עֵינֶיךָ֮ <WH5869> [are] not thine eyes הֲל֣וֹא <WH3808> not לֶאֱמוּנָה֒ <WH530> faithfulness הִכִּ֤יתָה <WH5221> beat אֹתָם֙ <WH853> וְֽלֹא־ <WH3808> have not חָ֔לוּ <WH2342> them but they have not grieved כִּלִּיתָ֕ם <WH3615> thou hast consumed מֵאֲנ֖וּ <WH3985> them [but] they have refused קַ֣חַת <WH3947> to receive מוּסָ֑ר <WH4148> correction חִזְּק֤וּ <WH2388> harder פְנֵיהֶם֙ <WH6440> they have made their faces מִסֶּ֔לַע <WH5553> than a rock מֵאֲנ֖וּ <WH3985> they have refused לָשֽׁוּב׃ <WH7725> to return

וַאֲנִ֣י <WH589> I אָמַ֔רְתִּי <WH559> Therefore I said אַךְ־ <WH389> are only דַּלִּ֖ים <WH1800> Surely these [are] poor הֵ֑ם <WH1992> They נוֹאֲל֕וּ <WH2973> they are foolish כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לֹ֤א <WH3808> not יָדְעוּ֙ <WH3045> for they know דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> not the way יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD מִשְׁפַּ֖ט <WH4941> [nor] the judgment אֱלֹהֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH430> of their God

אֵֽלֲכָה־ <WH1980> will go לִּ֤י אֶל־ <WH413> to הַגְּדֹלִים֙ <WH1419> me unto the great men וַאֲדַבְּרָ֣ה <WH1696> and will speak אוֹתָ֔ם <WH853> כִּ֣י <WH3588> for הֵ֗מָּה <WH1992> they יָדְעוּ֙ <WH3045> unto them for they have known דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> the way יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD מִשְׁפַּ֖ט <WH4941> [and] the judgment אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֑ם <WH430> of their God אַ֣ךְ <WH389> also הֵ֤מָּה <WH1992> with יַחְדָּו֙ <WH3162> but these have altogether שָׁ֣בְרוּ <WH7665> broken עֹ֔ל <WH5923> the yoke נִתְּק֖וּ <WH5423> [and] burst מוֹסֵרֽוֹת׃ <WH4147> the bonds

עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּן֩ <WH3651> after that הִכָּ֨ם <WH5221> shall slay אַרְיֵ֜ה <WH738> Wherefore a lion מִיַּ֗עַר <WH3293> out of the forest זְאֵ֤ב <WH2061> them [and] a wolf עֲרָבוֹת֙ <WH6160> of the evenings יְשָׁדְדֵ֔ם <WH7703> shall spoil נָמֵ֤ר <WH5246> them a leopard שֹׁקֵד֙ <WH8245> shall watch עַל־ <WH5921> and עָ֣רֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5892> over their cities כָּל־ <WH3605> Everyone הַיּוֹצֵ֥א <WH3318> every one that goeth out מֵהֵ֖נָּה <WH2007> thence shall יִטָּרֵ֑ף <WH2963> be torn in pieces כִּ֤י <WH3588> Because רַבּוּ֙ <WH7231> are many פִּשְׁעֵיהֶ֔ם <WH6588> because their transgressions עָצְמ֖וּ <WH6105> are increased [מְשֻׁבֹותֵיהֶם כ] (מְשׁוּבֹותֵיהֶֽם <WH4878> backsliding ק)

אֵ֤י <WH335> How לָזֹאת֙ <WH2063> likewise [אֶסְלֹוחַ־ כ] (אֶֽסְלַֽח־ <WH5545> pardon לָ֔ךְ <WH5545> shall I pardon ק) בָּנַ֣יִךְ <WH1121> your sons עֲזָב֔וּנִי <WH5800> have forsaken וַיִּשָּׁבְע֖וּ <WH7650> me and sworn בְּלֹ֣א <WH3808> by [them that are] no אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> gods וָאַשְׂבִּ֤עַ <WH7650> when I had fed them to the full אוֹתָם֙ <WH853> וַיִּנְאָ֔פוּ <WH5003> they then committed adultery וּבֵ֥ית <WH1004> houses זוֹנָ֖ה <WH2181> in the harlots' יִתְגֹּדָֽדוּ׃ <WH1413> and assembled themselves by troops

סוּסִ֥ים <WH5483> horses מְיֻזָּנִ֖ים <WH2109> They were [as] fed מַשְׁכִּ֣ים <WH7904> in the morning הָי֑וּ <WH1961> become אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> every one אֶל־ <WH413> after אֵ֥שֶׁת <WH802> wife רֵעֵ֖הוּ <WH7453> after his neighbour's יִצְהָֽלוּ׃ <WH6670> neighed

הַֽעַל־ <WH5921> and אֵ֥לֶּה <WH428> these לוֹא־ <WH3808> not אֶפְקֹ֖ד <WH6485> Shall I not visit נְאֻם־ <WH5002> for these [things]? saith יְהֹוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וְאִם֙ <WH518> and on בְּג֣וֹי <WH1471> on such a nation אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> such כָּזֶ֔ה <WH2088> this לֹ֥א <WH3808> not תִתְנַקֵּ֖ם <WH5358> be avenged נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <WH5315> and shall not my soul ס

עֲל֤וּ <WH5927> Go ye up בְשָׁרוֹתֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH8284> upon her walls וְשַׁחֵ֔תוּ <WH7843> and destroy וְכָלָ֖ה <WH3617> not a full end אַֽל־ <WH408> not תַּעֲשׂ֑וּ <WH6213> but make הָסִ֙ירוּ֙ <WH5493> take away נְטִ֣ישׁוֹתֶ֔יהָ <WH5189> her battlements כִּ֛י <WH3588> for ל֥וֹא <WH3808> are not לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> for they [are] not the LORD'S הֵֽמָּה׃ <WH1992> like

כִּי֩ <WH3588> for בָג֨וֹד <WH898> have dealt very בָּגְד֜וּ <WH898> treacherously בִּ֗י בֵּ֧ית <WH1004> For the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel וּבֵ֥ית <WH1004> and the house יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah נְאֻם־ <WH5002> against me saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

כִּֽחֲשׁוּ֙ <WH3584> They have belied בַּיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <WH559> and said לֹא־ <WH3808> not ה֑וּא <WH1931> he וְלֹא־ <WH3808> will not תָב֤וֹא <WH935> come עָלֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH5921> and רָעָ֔ה <WH7451> [It is] not he neither shall evil וְחֶ֥רֶב <WH2719> sword וְרָעָ֖ב <WH7458> nor famine ל֥וֹא <WH3808> and we will not נִרְאֶֽה׃ <WH7200> upon us neither shall we see

וְהַנְּבִיאִים֙ <WH5030> And the prophets יִֽהְי֣וּ <WH1961> become לְר֔וּחַ <WH7307> shall become wind וְהַדִּבֵּ֖ר <WH1699> and the word אֵ֣ין <WH369> else בָּהֶ֑ם כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> Thus יֵעָשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> [is] not in them thus shall it be done לָהֶֽם׃ ס

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> Therefore כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֤ר <WH559> Wherefore thus saith יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts יַ֚עַן <WH3282> Because דַּבֶּרְכֶ֔ם <WH1696> Because ye speak אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> this word הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this הִנְנִ֣י <WH2005> behold נֹתֵן֩ <WH5414> behold I will make דְּבָרַ֨י <WH1697> my words בְּפִ֜יךָ <WH6310> in thy mouth לְאֵ֗שׁ <WH784> fire וְהָעָ֥ם <WH5971> and this people הַזֶּ֛ה <WH2088> and this עֵצִ֖ים <WH6086> wood וַאֲכָלָֽתַם׃ <WH398> and it shall devour

הִנְנִ֣י <WH2005> behold מֵבִיא֩ <WH935> Lo I will bring עֲלֵיכֶ֨ם <WH5921> against גּ֧וֹי <WH1471> a nation מִמֶּרְחָ֛ק <WH4801> upon you from far בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> O house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהֹוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD גּ֣וֹי ׀ <WH1471> nation אֵיתָ֣ן <WH386> it [is] a mighty ה֗וּא <WH1931> he גּ֤וֹי <WH1471> nation מֵעוֹלָם֙ <WH5769> it [is] an ancient ה֔וּא <WH1931> he גּ֚וֹי <WH1471> a nation לֹא־ <WH3808> Nor תֵדַ֣ע <WH3045> thou knowest לְשֹׁנ֔וֹ <WH3956> whose language וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> Nor תִשְׁמַ֖ע <WH8085> not neither understandest מַה־ <WH4100> what יְדַבֵּֽר׃ <WH1696> what they say
אַשְׁפָּת֖וֹ <WH827> Their quiver כְּקֶ֣בֶר <WH6913> sepulchre פָּת֑וּחַ <WH6605> [is] as an open כֻּלָּ֖ם <WH3605> All גִּבּוֹרִֽים׃ <WH1368> they [are] all mighty men

וְאָכַ֨ל <WH398> And they shall eat up קְצִֽירְךָ֜ <WH7105> thine harvest וְלַחְמֶ֗ךָ <WH3899> and thy bread יֹאכְלוּ֙ <WH398> should eat בָּנֶ֣יךָ <WH1121> [which] thy sons וּבְנוֹתֶ֔יךָ <WH1323> and thy daughters יֹאכַ֤ל <WH398> they shall eat up צֹאנְךָ֙ <WH6629> thy flocks וּבְקָרֶ֔ךָ <WH1241> and thine herds יֹאכַ֥ל <WH398> they shall eat up גַּפְנְךָ֖ <WH1612> thy vines וּתְאֵנָתֶ֑ךָ <WH8384> and thy fig trees יְרֹשֵׁ֞שׁ <WH7567> they shall impoverish עָרֵ֣י <WH5892> cities מִבְצָרֶ֗יךָ <WH4013> thy fenced אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which אַתָּ֛ה <WH859> you בּוֹטֵ֥חַ <WH982> trustedst בָּהֵ֖נָּה <WH2007> wherein thou בֶּחָֽרֶב׃ <WH2719> with the sword

וְגַ֛ם <WH1571> even בַּיָּמִ֥ים <WH3117> Nevertheless in those days הָהֵ֖מָּה <WH1992> those נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהֹוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD לֹֽא־ <WH3808> I will not אֶעֱשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> I will not make אִתְּכֶ֖ם <WH854> for כָּלָֽה׃ <WH3617> a full end

וְהָיָה֙ <WH1961> shall come כִּ֣י <WH3588> when תֹאמְר֔וּ <WH559> And it shall come to pass when ye shall say תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> Thahash מֶ֗ה <WH4100> how long עָשָׂ֨ה <WH6213> doeth יְהֹוָ֧ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֛ינוּ <WH430> our God לָ֖נוּ אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> these וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> all these [things] unto us? then shalt thou answer אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH413> about כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> to them עֲזַבְתֶּ֤ם <WH5800> them Like as ye have forsaken אוֹתִי֙ <WH853> וַתַּעַבְד֞וּ <WH5647> me and served אֱלֹהֵ֤י <WH430> gods נֵכָר֙ <WH5236> strange בְּאַרְצְכֶ֔ם <WH776> in your land כֵּ֚ן <WH3651> so תַּעַבְד֣וּ <WH5647> so shall ye serve זָרִ֔ים <WH2114> strangers בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> in a land לֹ֥א <WH3808> not לָכֶֽם׃ ס

הַגִּ֥ידוּ <WH5046> Declare זֹ֖את <WH2063> in בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> this in the house יַעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> of Jacob וְהַשְׁמִיע֥וּהָ <WH8085> and publish בִיהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> it in Judah לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

שִׁמְעוּ־ <WH8085> Hear נָ֣א <WH4994> Now זֹ֔את <WH2063> likewise עַ֥ם <WH5971> people סָכָ֖ל <WH5530> now this O foolish וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> and without לֵ֑ב <WH3820> and without understanding עֵינַ֤יִם <WH5869> which have eyes לָהֶם֙ וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not יִרְא֔וּ <WH7200> and see אָזְנַ֥יִם <WH241> not which have ears לָהֶ֖ם וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not יִשְׁמָֽעוּ׃ <WH8085> and hear

הַאוֹתִ֨י <WH853> לֹא־ <WH3808> cannot תִירָ֜אוּ <WH3372> Fear נְאֻם־ <WH5002> ye not me? saith יְהֹוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD אִ֤ם <WH518> at מִפָּנַי֙ <WH6440> at my presence לֹ֣א <WH3808> cannot תָחִ֔ילוּ <WH2342> will ye not tremble אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which שַׂ֤מְתִּי <WH7760> which have placed חוֹל֙ <WH2344> the sand גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> [for] the bound לַיָּ֔ם <WH3220> of the sea חָק־ <WH2706> decree עוֹלָ֖ם <WH5769> by a perpetual וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> cannot יַעַבְרֶ֑נְהוּ <WH5674> that it cannot pass וַיִּֽתְגָּעֲשׁוּ֙ <WH1607> thereof toss וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> cannot יוּכָ֔לוּ <WH3201> themselves yet can they not prevail וְהָמ֥וּ <WH1993> though they roar גַלָּ֖יו <WH1530> it and though the waves וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> cannot יַעַבְרֻֽנְהוּ׃ <WH5674> yet can they not pass over

וְלָעָ֤ם <WH5971> But this people הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> this הָיָ֔ה <WH1961> has לֵ֖ב <WH3820> heart סוֹרֵ֣ר <WH5637> hath a revolting וּמוֹרֶ֑ה <WH4784> and a rebellious סָ֖רוּ <WH5493> they are revolted וַיֵּלֵֽכוּ׃ <WH1980> and departed

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not אָמְר֣וּ <WH559> Neither say בִלְבָבָ֗ם <WH3824> they in their heart נִ֤ירָא <WH3372> Let us now fear נָא֙ <WH4994> now אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <WH430> our God הַנֹּתֵ֗ן <WH5414> that giveth גֶּ֛שֶׁם <WH1653> rain [וְיֹרֶה כ] (יֹורֶ֥ה <WH3138> autumn rain ק) וּמַלְק֖וֹשׁ <WH4456> and the latter בְּעִתּ֑וֹ <WH6256> in his season שְׁבֻע֛וֹת <WH7620> weeks חֻקּ֥וֹת <WH2708> unto us the appointed קָצִ֖יר <WH7105> of the harvest יִשְׁמָר־ <WH8104> he reserveth לָֽנוּ׃

עֲוֹנוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <WH5771> Your iniquities הִטּוּ־ <WH5186> have turned away אֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> these וְחַטֹּ֣אותֵיכֶ֔ם <WH2403> these [things] and your sins מָנְע֥וּ <WH4513> have withholden הַטּ֖וֹב <WH2896> good מִכֶּֽם׃ <WH4480> at

כִּי־ <WH3588> for נִמְצְא֥וּ <WH4672> are found בְעַמִּ֖י <WH5971> For among my people רְשָׁעִ֑ים <WH7563> wicked יָשׁוּר֙ <WH7789> [men] they lay wait כְּשַׁ֣ךְ <WH7918> as he that setteth יְקוּשִׁ֔ים <WH3353> snares הִצִּ֥יבוּ <WH5324> they set מַשְׁחִ֖ית <WH4889> a trap אֲנָשִׁ֥ים <WH582> men יִלְכֹּֽדוּ׃ <WH3920> they catch

כִּכְלוּב֙ <WH3619> As a cage מָ֣לֵא <WH4392> is full ע֔וֹף <WH5775> of birds כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> So בָּתֵּיהֶ֖ם <WH1004> so [are] their houses מְלֵאִ֣ים <WH4392> full מִרְמָ֑ה <WH4820> of deceit עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> So גָּדְל֖וּ <WH1431> therefore they are become great וַֽיַּעֲשִֽׁירוּ׃ <WH6238> and waxen rich

שָׁמְנ֣וּ <WH8080> They are waxen fat עָשְׁת֗וּ <WH6245> they shine גַּ֚ם <WH1571> also עָֽבְר֣וּ <WH5674> yea they overpass דִבְרֵי־ <WH1697> the deeds רָ֔ע <WH7451> of the wicked דִּ֣ין <WH1779> not the cause לֹא־ <WH3808> not דָ֔נוּ <WH1777> they judge דִּ֥ין <WH1779> the cause יָת֖וֹם <WH3490> the cause of the fatherless וְיַצְלִ֑יחוּ <WH6743> yet they prosper וּמִשְׁפַּ֥ט <WH4941> and the right אֶבְיוֹנִ֖ים <WH34> of the needy לֹ֥א <WH3808> not שָׁפָֽטוּ׃ <WH8199> do they not judge

הַֽעַל־ <WH5921> and אֵ֥לֶּה <WH428> these לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not אֶפְקֹ֖ד <WH6485> Shall I not visit נְאֻם־ <WH5002> for these [things]? saith יְהֹוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD אִ֚ם <WH518> On בְּג֣וֹי <WH1471> on such a nation אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> such כָּזֶ֔ה <WH2088> this לֹ֥א <WH3808> not תִתְנַקֵּ֖ם <WH5358> be avenged נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <WH5315> shall not my soul ס
שַׁמָּה֙ <WH8047> A wonderful וְשַׁ֣עֲרוּרָ֔ה <WH8186> and horrible thing נִהְיְתָ֖ה <WH1961> is committed בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> in the land

הַנְּבִיאִ֞ים <WH5030> The prophets נִבְּא֣וּ־ <WH5012> prophesy בַשֶּׁ֗קֶר <WH8267> falsely וְהַכֹּהֲנִים֙ <WH3548> and the priests יִרְדּ֣וּ <WH7287> bear rule עַל־ <WH5921> on יְדֵיהֶ֔ם <WH3027> by their means וְעַמִּ֖י <WH5971> and my people אָ֣הֲבוּ <WH157> love כֵ֑ן <WH3651> so וּמַֽה־ <WH4100> what תַּעֲשׂ֖וּ <WH6213> [to have it] so and what will ye do לְאַחֲרִיתָֽהּ׃ <WH319> in the end
